pkgmetadata.longdescription: Numerical Association Rule Mining using Population-Based Nature- Inspired Algorithms // Framework is devoted to mining numerical association rules through the utilization of nature-inspired algorithms for optimization. Drawing inspiration from the 'NiaARM' 'Python' and the 'NiaARM' 'Julia' packages, this repository introduces the capability to perform numerical association rule mining in the R programming language. Fister Jr., Iglesias, Galvez, Del Ser, Osaba and Fister (2018) doi:10.1007/978-3-030-03493-1_9.
